graph.original_query: Find comprehensive flight options from Delhi to Tokyo, use a single step for retriever agent but multiple iterations to compile this data.

T001.initial_thoughts: Let me think through this... The user is asking for flight options from Delhi to Tokyo. I should use the `search_web_with_text_content` tool to find relevant flight information. I'll include multiple code variants to explore different search queries and ensure comprehensive results.

code.CODE_1:
results = search_web_with_text_content('flights from Delhi to Tokyo DEL to TYO booking prices airlines', 10)
output = {'flight_options': results}
code.CODE_2:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Delhi to Tokyo flights airfare direct routes travel agencies', 8)
output = {'flight_options': results}
code.CODE_3:
results = search_web_with_text_content('flights from Indira Gandhi International Airport to Narita International Airport prices airlines', 7)
output = {'flight_options': results}

nodes.description: Retrieve more flight options to cover more airlines and date ranges.
nodes.agent_prompt: Find additional flight options from Delhi (DEL) to Tokyo (TYO) for different airlines and date ranges not covered in the initial set. Limit to 10 results. Ensure that these are different from the ones already retrieved.

nodes.description: Retrieve further flight options for additional date ranges and airlines, ensuring comprehensive coverage.
nodes.agent_prompt: Find further flight options from Delhi (DEL) to Tokyo (TYO) for more date ranges and airlines, making sure to cover any gaps in the previously retrieved data. Limit to 10 results, avoiding duplicates from T001 and T002.

nodes.description: Compile all retrieved flight options into a comprehensive list.
nodes.agent_prompt: Compile a comprehensive list of all flight options from Delhi to Tokyo based on the data retrieved in tasks T001, T002, and T003. Remove any duplicate entries, sort the list by price and departure time, and include key details such as airline, flight number, departure and arrival times, layover duration, and total price.

nodes.description: Format the compiled flight options into a human-readable table.
nodes.agent_prompt: Format the compiled flight options from T004 into a well-structured, human-readable HTML table. The table should include columns for Airline, Flight Number, Departure Time, Arrival Time, Layover Duration, and Total Price. Ensure the table is easy to read and visually appealing.
